title: J. K. Simmons
summary: Jonathan Kimble Simmons[1] (born January 9, 1955)[2] is an American actor. On television, he is known for playing Dr. Emil Skoda on the NBC series Law & Order, Vernon Schillinger on the HBO series Oz, Assistant Police Chief Will Pope on TNT's The Closer, and Nolan “Omni-Man” Grayson on the Amazon Prime series Invincible. From 2017 to 2019, he starred as Howard Silk in the Starz series Counterpart.
